nodes.bodyText: I was being excessively(?) worried about conflicting with something rxjava (or someone else) might add into the rx. package in the future

It sort of matches the convention of prefixing field names with __opentelemetry when we inject fields into other peoples classes.
The name is also weird tho, I will change it to OpenTelemetryTracingUtil if you think that's better.
TBH, it doesn't really matter to me.  I can live with it either way.
This key will be used in logging config.  I suggest keeping it short.  ot.trace_id should be sufficient.
